page.title: 04SHOPS
page.content: The area is quiet in Winter but busy in Summer.There are plenty of hotels and bed and breakfast houses. There is sand all along the street.The shops are small but sell a lot of things.Here is a list of the shops - Spar Trearddur Stores,Gill's Newsagents,The Salad Bowl . The Spar shop sells things you find in a supermarket but it isn't big.It has 2 parts to it. The Salad Bowl sells health foods. Gill's Newsagents is also a Gift shop.The shops are usually quiet and only get busy when there are lots of visitors about.
